snippet: Keely Garfield’s “Telling the Bees,” at the Chocolate Factory, is based on a beekeeping tradition from Northern Europe.
abstract: Gia Kourlas reviews premiere of Keely Garfield dance Telling the Bees at Chocolate Factory.
lead_paragraph: Keely Garfield’s “Telling the Bees,” at the Chocolate Factory, is based on a beekeeping tradition from Northern Europe.

headline.seo: Keely Garfield’s ‘Telling the Bees,’ at Chocolate Factory
headline.main: Busy Bees Need Death Notices, Too, to Move on to the Next Keeper
